title: Unable to invite friends to flex queue. Rating check using wrong metrics.
body:
BUG

When I try to invite people to play flex with me, it determines if they can join or not based on my solo queue rating not my flex rating. This is happening for all my friends too. I know this is the issue because we can still play together, I just can't be the one sending the invites, I need a friend who is lower ranked in solo queue to create the game.

Anyway I can work around this issue but it is quite inconvenient.

OCE server. I use the old client
